titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/6/2001--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Proposes that: (1) equality of rights under the law shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or by any State on account of gender; and (2) reproductive rights for women under the law shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or any State.
